categories: Category:Star Wars Adventures: Ghosts of Vader's Castle

nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures: Ghosts of Vader's Castle

Star Wars Adventures: Ghosts of Vader's Castle is a forthcoming comic book miniseries to be published by IDW Publishing. A follow-up to the one-shot Star Wars Adventures: Shadow of Vader's Castle, the series, to be written by Cavan Scott, will be five issues and will follow up on the heroes of the earlier Vader's Castle miniseries. Francesco Francavilla will illustrate the framing story, which will focus on Vaneé, while Derek Charm, Megan Levens, Chris Fenoglio and Robert Hack will also provide artwork.
